products.title: Orient Faux Silk Latte Brown Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Orient faux silk latte brown roman blind in brown. Made to measure from 14.99 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their orient faux-silk roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. 
 This latte brown faux-silk roman blind, introduces a medium brownshade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or light accessories. 
 Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a free five year warranty, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Devonshire, Light Brown - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Devonshire, light brown - roman blind introduce a sophisticated and stylish look to your home with the devonshire in light brown, where biscuit and taupe threads fuse to form a distinct look with a washed denim effect, creating a casual blind with subtle
products.productdescription: Introduce a sophisticated and stylish look to your home with the devonshire in light brown, where biscuit and taupe threads fuse to form a distinct look with a washed denim effect, creating a casual blind with subtle texture and harmonising hues.Blend the light brown with opulent linens and fresh bursts of ivory to create a clean and contemporary palette, enriching the blind with complementary fabrics in warm caramel and mocha tones for and elegant feel, and adding bursts of gold for a touch of luxe.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Delphinium, Caramel - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Delphinium, caramel - roman blind form an artistic and individual space by including the attractive watercoloured print of the delphinium caramel blind. An array of dove grey, caramel, and oatmeal forms an artsy floral print on a relaxed and nimble cloth,
products.productdescription: Form an artistic and individual space by including the attractive watercoloured print of the delphinium caramel blind. An array of dove grey, caramel, and oatmeal forms an artsy floral print on a relaxed and nimble cloth, showcasing creative personality with little effort. Combine the caramel with a soothing biscuit base for a relaxed and welcoming feel, adding soft furnishings and layered fabrics in gracious shades of slate grey, oatmeal, and honey. Stick to one or two feature colours to create continuity for a streamlined and classy finish.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Maurice, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Maurice, chocolate - roman blind dark and chocolatey, the maurice in chocolate is the height of luxe. This roman blind keeps it simple though, letting its gorgeously textured fabric and rich coffee hue speak for themselves, without pattern or fuss.<b
products.productdescription: Dark and chocolatey, the maurice in chocolate is the height of luxe. This roman blind keeps it simple though, letting its gorgeously textured fabric and rich coffee hue speak for themselves, without pattern or fuss.The neutrality of the chocolate makes it an adaptable buddy for accompanying a wide range of design and colour schemes, so feel free to take your pick when it comes to backdrops and accents. Try it with a striking cobalt blue for an eye-catching colour match that will work fantastically at livening up your living room or den. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Faux Suede, Dark Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Faux suede, dark chocolate - roman blind form a luxurious and inviting feel in any surrounding with the faux suede in delicious dark chocolate, where a blend of fine threads form a sultry suede effect for a modern blind full of tempting texture and contem
products.productdescription: Form a luxurious and inviting feel in any surrounding with the faux suede in delicious dark chocolate, where a blend of fine threads form a sultry suede effect for a modern blind full of tempting texture and contemporary style. Create a welcoming and cosy living room by complementing the dark chocolate with alike velvety materials and sumptuous linens, incorporating the deep brown hue with similar cocoa tones and caramel hints for a delectable and everlasting palette of dessert-inspired shades.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Sicily, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Sicily, chocolate - roman blind in subtle mocha and golden taupe, the sicily chocolate is simply delectable. Pretty diamonds emboss the plain fabric, and further adornments come in the form of fluffy tufts of coffee on top, adding texture and depth to thi
products.productdescription: In subtle mocha and golden taupe, the sicily chocolate is simply delectable. Pretty diamonds emboss the plain fabric, and further adornments come in the form of fluffy tufts of coffee on top, adding texture and depth to this discreetly glamorous blind. Fashion a classic brown, gold, and cream scheme in the spare bedroom so that your guests can relax in comfort and style, making themselves at home. Blend the chocolate with cream walls, medium wooden furniture, and golden accessories for a cosy and coordinated finish. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Maurice, Caramel - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Maurice, caramel - roman blind impress your guests with the elegant and alluring maurice in caramel, showcasing a sophisticated neutral shade of honeyed beige and presented on a plush, velvety cloth made from silky thread for enriching texture and a tempt
products.productdescription: Impress your guests with the elegant and alluring maurice in caramel, showcasing a sophisticated neutral shade of honeyed beige and presented on a plush, velvety cloth made from silky thread for enriching texture and a tempting golden sheen. Merge the glossy caramel with beguiling shades of buttery cream, taupe, and mocha for a heavenly and inviting palette. Incorporate soft furnishings and plush throws with dreamy, downy textures, adding eye-catching gilded ornaments and golden accessories for a luxuriant finish with traditional style.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Grove, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Grove, auburn - roman blind a pretty country roman blind, the grove in auburn features artistic florals in autumnal tones of red, rust, lilac, and green, among others, and the look is strikingly understated. The cotton fabric means it's soft and supple ye
products.productdescription: A pretty country roman blind, the grove in auburn features artistic florals in autumnal tones of red, rust, lilac, and green, among others, and the look is strikingly understated. The cotton fabric means it's soft and supple yet strong and sturdy, so will sit beautifully in neat roman folds.The auburn surely belongs in the kitchen, set amidst other country hues. Think cream walls and sage green kitchen units and cupboards, with rusty oranges and rural mauves accenting across the board.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Paradise, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Paradise, auburn - roman blind the autumn country tones of the paradise in auburn are pretty and understated, displaying an array of wispy florals and foliage across a white base. With pinks, greens, and yellows included in the palette, this is a subtly c
products.productdescription: The autumn country tones of the paradise in auburn are pretty and understated, displaying an array of wispy florals and foliage across a white base. With pinks, greens, and yellows included in the palette, this is a subtly colourful piece that will work in a variety of dcor schemes.Team the auburn with apple greens in the kitchen, where some chalk paint will make over your units, and creamy walls will offset the green beautifully. Add other florals, as well as accenting hues, throughout the rest of the room for balance.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Woodland, Auburn - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Woodland, auburn - roman blind the abstract tree patterning of the woodland in auburn is both captivating and relaxing, whilst it's autumnal greens and browns give it a gorgeously cosy feel. And, on 100% cotton material, it folds beautifully into the neat
products.productdescription: The abstract tree patterning of the woodland in auburn is both captivating and relaxing, whilst it's autumnal greens and browns give it a gorgeously cosy feel. And, on 100% cotton material, it folds beautifully into the neat folds that make the roman blind so special.Go for an autumn-themed living room by surrounding the auburn with similar green and brown colours in natural tones. Choose natural woods, jute rugs, and plenty of wools, accenting throughout with the occasional deep forest green and chocolate brown to add depth and interest.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Nova, Walnut - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Nova, walnut - roman blind the smooth, moccasin-feel nova walnut offers an appetising chocolate brown, giving it a cosy and warm look and feel. Detailing is added using tiny zigzag patterning in contrasting brown shades, providing this blind with depth an
products.productdescription: The smooth, moccasin-feel nova walnut offers an appetising chocolate brown, giving it a cosy and warm look and feel. Detailing is added using tiny zigzag patterning in contrasting brown shades, providing this blind with depth and texture. Use the walnut as part of a snug living room or den, accompanied by country cream walls and medium woods. For an accent colour, opt for a soft aqua or duck egg for a modern and calming feel, or shimmering gold for a touch of glamour.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Kent, Chocolate - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Kent, chocolate - roman blind brown doesn't get much deeper, darker, or richer than the sumptuous chocolate from the chenille-textured kent collection. You'll adore the palatable hue this blind gives off, as well as the way in which it falls into the curv
products.productdescription: Brown doesn't get much deeper, darker, or richer than the sumptuous chocolate from the chenille-textured kent collection. You'll adore the palatable hue this blind gives off, as well as the way in which it falls into the curving roman arches. Team the chocolate with softer lattes, oatmeals, and creams for a cosy and warm ambience in the living room. Opt for polished woods, whether light, medium, or dark, and use shimmering or brushed golds to add an understated sense of glamour to the room. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Kent, Caramel - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Kent, caramel - roman blind in a delicious golden tone, the kent caramel is true to its name, and its rich look is only emphasised by the soft texturing of the fabric. This sophisticated shade is sure to add class and elegance to any room in the home, and
products.productdescription: In a delicious golden tone, the kent caramel is true to its name, and its rich look is only emphasised by the soft texturing of the fabric. This sophisticated shade is sure to add class and elegance to any room in the home, and will match a wide range of stronger, bolder hues. Couple the caramel with a jet black for a contemporary yet opulent finish in a new-build's living room. You, and your guests, will love this sumptuous colour combination, which is easily accented with gold and black soft furnishings and accessories.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.
